mapper.sql: node.id as node_id, node.parent_id, node.template_id, node.node_type_id, node.name as node_name, node.position, node.is_required, node.has_attachment, node.creator as node_creator, node.create_time as node_create_time, node.modifier as node_modifier, node.modify_time as node_modify_time
mapper.insert: insert into node (id, parent_id, template_id, node_type_id, name, position, is_required, has_attachment, creator, create_time, modifier, modify_time ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{templateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nodeTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{position,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isRequired,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{hasAttachment,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now())

mapper.update:
update node
parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
template_id = #{templateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
node_type_id = #{nodeTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
position = #{position,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_required = #{isRequired,jdbcType=CHAR},
has_attachment = #{hasAttachment,jdbcType=CHAR},
creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = now(),
modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modify_time = now()
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update node set parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, template_id = #{templateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, node_type_id = #{nodeTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, position = #{position,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_required = #{isRequired,jdbcType=CHAR}, has_attachment = #{hasAttachment,jdbcType=CHAR}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = now(), modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_time = now() where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
